conjecture: For all monic real-rooted polynomials p, q of degree n with simple roots, 1/Phi_n(p boxplus_n q) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q). APPROACH: Modified Strategy 3 via clean reformulation: (Phi_n(p) - Phi_n(r))(Phi_n(q) - Phi_n(r)) >= Phi_n(r)^2, where r = p boxplus_n q and u = h + alpha, v = h + beta from the chain rule with omega_1'(nu_k) = omega_2'(nu_k) = 1.
author: orchestrator
